name: 吳傳威
objective: This course aims at instructing students to know and familiar with the various applications of computer in civil engineering fields. It includes computer aid calculations and the usage of softwares.
schedule:
1st week	Orientation
2nd week	Introduction of the course
3rd week	Introduction of the tools used - Shear & Moment Diagrams
4th week	RC Single Reinforced Beams
5th week	RC Doubly Reinforced Beams
6th week	Design of RC Beams
7th week	RC Columns – Theories
8th week	RC Columns – P-M Diagrams
9th week	Midterm exam.
10th week     Matrix Algebra
11th week     Matrix Computation
12th week	Introduction to FEM
13th week	Element Stiffness Matrices
14th week	Introduction of the ETABS 
15th week	Application of ETABS
16th week	Application of ETABS
17th week	Final Report
18th week	Final Report
